resources.description: "The Network  Natura 2000 is a European Ecological Network areas, which host natural habitat types and species habitats that are important at European level. Greece has now designated 202 Special Protection Areas (SPAs) and 241 Sites of Community Importance (SCI), of which two are also proposed. The available constitute the issue 29 (v.29),which arose after updating the database Natura 2000 in May 2011. The changes to data are documented in the paper ""UPDATE DATABASE OF THE NATURA 2000 - MAY 2011"" (http://www.ypeka.gr/LinkClick.aspx?fileticket=h4RzmKEMXHM% 3d & tabid = 504 & language = el-GR). The species designation of Special Protection Areas are listed in the document (http://www.ypeka.gr/LinkClick.aspx?fileticket=iIe61% 2fEm2Mc% 3d & tabid = 432) in SHP."
resources.name: The NATURA 2000 network and the protected areas in SHP
